sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-button type="primary" @click="add()" class="box-card1">添加</el-button>
   <el-card class="box-card"></el-card>
  
</template>



<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      currentPage: 1, //默认页码为1
      pagesize: 8, //默认一页显示10条
      dialogVisible: false,
      dialogVisible1: false,
      dialogVisible2: false,
      info: {}, //修改数据
      info1: {}, //新增数据
      tbData: [],
      form: [],
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {
    handleSizeChange: function (size) {
      //一页显示多少条

      this.pagesize = size
    },

    handleCurrentChange: function (currentPage) {
      //页码更改方法

      this.currentPage = currentPage
    },
    handleClick(data) {
      this.info = data.row
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible
    },
    del(data) {
      console.log(data.row.departmentId)
      get('/deleteDepartment', { departmentId: data.row.departmentId }).then(
        (res) => {
          ElMessage({
            message: '删除成功！',
            type: 'success'
          })
        }
      )
      window.location.reload() //刷新
    },
    edit() {
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible //马上消失
      //作用是调整下createTime的格式
      var dt = new Date(this.info.createTime)
      let year = dt.getFullYear()
      let month = dt.getMonth() + 1
      let date = dt.getDate()
      this.info.createTime = year + '/' + month + '/' + date
      get('/updateDepartment', this.info).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '修改成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    },
    add() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
    },
    // insert() {
    //   this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
    //   get('/addDepartment', {
    //     departmentName: this.props.departmentName,
    //     level: '1',
    //   }).then((res) => {
    //     console.log('==============================')
    //     ElMessage({
    //       message: '添加成功',
    //       type: 'success'
    //     })
    //     // 刷新
    //     window.location.reload()
    //     ElMessage({
    //       message: '添加失败',
    //       type: 'danger'
    //     })
    //   })
    // }
    insert() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
      get('/addDepartment', {
        departmentName: this.info1.departmentName,
        level: '1'
      }).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '添加成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    },
    add2(row) {
      // console.log("==============")
      // console.log(row.row.departmentId)
      this.form.parentId = row.row.departmentId
      //this.list=row.row
      this.dialogVisible2 = !this.dialogVisible2
    },
    insert2() {
      this.dialogVisible2 = !this.dialogVisible2
      console.log('========================')
      console.log(this.form)
      get('/addDepartment', {
        // departmentName: this.form.departmentName,
        departmentName: this.form.departmentName,
        level: '2',
        parentId: this.form.parentId
      }).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '添加成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang='scss' scoped>
.demo-table-expand {
  font-size: 0;
}
.demo-table-expand label {
  width: 0px;
  color: #99a9bf;
}
.demo-table-expand .el-form-item {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  width: 50%;
}
.el-table
  .el-table--fit
  .el-table--enable-row-hover
  .el-table--enable-row-transition {
  margin-left: 47px !important;
}
.box-card {
  margin-top: 5px;
  margin-left: 15px;
  margin-right: 15px;
}
.box-card1 {
  margin-top: 5px;
  margin-left: 15px;
}
</style>
